name: The Widsith
description: A heavy notebook filled with musical scores. Though suffering from moth damage and heavy wear-and-tear, there is still much power to be found among the hand-written words within.
refinements:
When a character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s.
: ATK is increased by **60**
%.
: Increases all Elemental DMG by **48**
%.
: Elemental Mastery is increased by **240**
.
